title: Strengthening Organizational Development Practical Competencies: Problem-Solving Competency Enhancement Through Realistic Mathematics Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic arithmetic operations and experience in solving real-life problems
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can convert given real-life problems into mathematical models.
Learners can evaluate and improve problem-solving strategies through argumentation with peers.

Within one week, learners can present a project applying either linear regression or an optimization model on a case study about public/nonprofit organizational efficiency within 10 minutes. They must achieve an average score of 3.5 or higher on a 5-point scale from peer evaluations and instructor feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
